Text.Page:
At first, I thought it was a trap because the code was so easy to break, but...in any case, the order talks about an imminent, full-fledged assault by the Red Lash pirates!

The risk is greatest at Vanguard Bastion. I want you to go there and help them, . If you can do for them what you've done for us here, I'm certain everything will turn out fine.

One other thing: you're going to have to swim to get there.

So, Red Lash pirates are gearing up to mount an attack... It's time for us to do what we came to do.

And by "we," I'm including you. It's time to put your game face on.
